sources.title: Kelly of the Secret Service (1936) CLASSIC THRILLER
sources.description:
CLASSIC MOVIE MONDAY
Director: Robert F. Hill
Stars: Lloyd Hughes, Sheila Bromley, Jack Mulhall, Fuzzy Knight

National security is under threat after top-secret plans for a radio-controlled aerial bomb are stolen. A G-man is sent in to save the day but must contend with sinister spies, hypnotized assassins, and the unstoppable Fuzzy Knight. Widely considered the best feature film produced by Sam Katzman's Victory Pictures.

metadata.Plot: A secret apparatus that controls bombs by remote control is stolen from a laboratory. A federal agent is assigned to recover it, and his investigation leads him to a creepy mansion that is honeycombed with secret passage ways.
metadata.Actors: Lloyd Hughes, Sheila Bromley, Forrest Taylor
